foreignData.name: Bedingungsloser Krieg
foreignData.text: Wenn ein Spieler einen Angriff deklariert, zerstöre alle nicht getappten Nichtmauerkreaturen, die dieser Spieler beherrscht und die nicht angreifen. Zerstöre keine Kreatur, die der Spieler zu Beginn des Zuges noch nicht beherrscht hat.

name: Total War
originalText: Whenever any player declares an attack, destroy all untapped non-wall creatures that player controls that don't attack. Do not destroy creatures the player did not control at the beginning of the turn.

rulings.text: Destroys creatures as a triggered ability on the declaration of attackers.

text: Whenever a player attacks with one or more creatures, destroy all untapped non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack, except for creatures the player hasn't controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn.
